label: Audit
description: Information about who created or updated the content and when.

createdBy.label: Created by
createdBy.description: Name or ID of the user who created this entry.

updatedBy.label: Updated by
updatedBy.description: Name or ID of the user who last updated this entry.

createdAt.label: Created at
createdAt.description: Date/time when the entry was created.

updatedAt.label: Updated at
updatedAt.description: Date/time when the entry was last updated.
